Package javax.jcr.lock

Content Repository API for Java (JCR 1.0) locking

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Lock
    Represents a lock placed on an item.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LockException
    Exception thrown by Item.save() and Session.save() when persisting a change would conflict with a lock.

Package javax.jcr.lock Description

Content Repository API for Java (JCR 1.0) locking
